PermissionSetGroupComponent.name: PermissionSetGroupComponent
PermissionSetGroupComponent.description: A junction object that relates the PermissionSetGroup and PermissionSet objects via their respective IDs; enables permission set group recalculation to determine the aggregated permissions for the group.

PermissionSetGroupId.description: The unique permission set group ID.

PermissionSetId.description: The unique permission set ID of a permission set in a permission set group.
